title: new ranked punishment system.
body:
if you get the equivalent of a 1 week ban more than once, your account is permanently deleted.

I am only giving them a freebie because chances are they won't change, but hey, I'm an optimist ;)

seriously though... ranked does need more stringent guidelines...

 I also think that a ping-o-meter should be implemented so people have to pass a ping check before people can load into the game for ranked.... basically counts as a dodge if you fail the ping test. why not?
